metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30472 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in PoDoFo 0.9.7. A stack-based buffer overflow in PdfEncryptMD5Base::ComputeOwnerKey function in PdfEncrypt.cpp is possible because of a improper check of the keyLength value.

criterions.comment: libpodofo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
